title: S3. Ep 30. Unlocking Australian Property Development Challenges: In-Depth Discussion with Industry Expert Illan Samuel
excerpt: Join us for a conversation with Illan Samuel, founder of Samuel Property, as we delve into the dynamic world of construction and property development in Australia, specifically in Victoria.
author: Building Environs

sections.heading: S3. Ep 30. Unlocking Australian Property Development Challenges: In-Depth Discussion with Industry Expert Illan Samuel

sections.content: Hey Legends! Welcome back to The Building Talks Podcast! Join us for a conversation with +[Illan Samuel,](https://www.linkedin.com/in/illansamuel/)+ founder of +[Samuel Property,](https://www.samuel.com.au/)+ as we delve into the dynamic world of construction and property development in Australia, specifically in Victoria. Discover valuable insights into market conditions, challenges, and opportunities in today's landscape.

Listen in as Illan gives his honest thoughts on the performance of some local councils, planning constraints and State Government Ministers who are responsible for (failing to) manage the 'levers' within the property market and his thoughts on NIMBY's & YIMBY's and their effect on the property development space.

Key takeaways include the importance of finding opportunities, building relationships, and networking effectively in property development. Learn how experience, strategic approaches, and collaboration play vital roles in navigating the evolving industry.

Whether you're a professional in the field or simply interested in the property market, this episode offers thought-provoking discussions and potential solutions. Tune in now to gain valuable insights and stay ahead in the Australian construction scene!

items: **10:03** The Evolution of Ilan Samuel's Development Projects
**34:36** Challenges and Changes in the Property Development Landscape
**43:41** The Role of Local Politicians and Qualified Professionals
**01:01:29** The Potential for Growth in the Apartment Building Sector
